page_content: The page is about an educational program where students explore construction as an artistic motif using large elements like gears.
The page discusses an archaeological field course where volunteers learn about excavation techniques and the history of the site.
The page discusses the efforts to control the spread of the allergenic plant Ambrosia in Aargauer municipalities.
The page discusses the increased risk of flooding in the Kanton Aargau due to recent rainfall and temperature rise.
The page provides information on how to apply for scholarships and loans for education in the Kanton Aargau.
The page provides various forms and guidelines related to emergency preparedness for chemical incidents in the Kanton Aargau.
The page provides information on the role of a caregiver in emergency situations, including possible further training options in various functions.
